title: S16 Ep58: The Shadow Dimension w/ Mike Ricksecker
itunes:title: The Shadow Dimension w/ Mike Ricksecker
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Shadow Dimension with guest Mike Ricksecker
Shadow entities are some of the most mysterious phenomena in the known universe, and Mike Ricksecker has experienced many, starting with a tall, dark humanoid figure that appeared in his room as a child. Today we dive into his experiences, new stories and discuss the mythos of The Shadow Realm and Shadow People!

Get Mike's book: https://amzn.to/3fKz5VT

See the Docuseries: www.ShadowDimension.com
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
